description: Implement full CRUD operations for user management in admin section using nestjs-query auto-generated resolvers. Add mutations for creating users, updating user roles, suspending accounts, and resetting passwords. Apply RoleGuard to ensure only admins can access. Create admin UI page at /admin/users with table view, search, filters, and bulk actions.
title: Admin User Management CRUD Operations
